newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to list options on VideoServer, Fresenius.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to list options on VideoServer, Fresenius.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) said on Friday it would list options on VideoServer Inc on September 25.
The exchange also said it would list options on American Depositary Shares of Fresenius Medical Care AG on September 27.
It said VideoServer options would have initial expirations of October, November, January and April, and opening strike prices of 30, 35 and 40.
Eclipse LLC has been named the designated primary market maker for the options, it said.
Fresenius Medical Care AG is a combination of Fresenius AG's worldwide kidney dialysis business and National Medical Care Inc, formerly a unit of W.R. Grace & Co.
On Monday, Grace said its shareholders approved the $4.4 billion plan to merge National Medical Care with Fresenius AG.
Fresenius options would have expiration months of October, November, February and May, with opening strike prices of 20, 22-1/2 and 25.
The options would trade in the Texas Instruments trading crowd, the CBOE said. -Derivatives desk, (312) 408-8750/E-mail: derivatives@reuters.com
